name: Abductor Virgins
description: Deadly mechanical constructs who wield massive blades.

name: Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader
description: Remarkably agile and aggressive warrior. Dangerous even for those with shield coverage...
location: Ringleader's Evergoal, Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Alecto Black Knife Ringleader
description: Remarkably agile and aggressive warrior. Dangerous even for those with shield coverage...

name: Alabaster Lord
description: An Evergaol prisoner wielding a vicious sword and the void with murderous intent.
location: Royal Grave Evergaol, Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Adan, Thief Of Fire
description: An evergaol prisoner and former battle mage, Adan wields a spiked flail and uses stolen knowledge of fire magic to great effect.

name: Ancient Dragon Lansseax
description: Lansseax was the sister of Fortissax. It is said that she took the from of a human to commune with the knights as a priestess of the ancient dragon cult.

name: Ancestor Spirit
description: A glowing spirit that takes the form of a large deer, making it a menacing threat when charging at targets.

name: Ancient Hero Of Zamor
description: Noticeably agile, frost-made creature suceptible to magic attacks.

name: Beast Clergyman
description: Temporarily overtaken by their bestial rage, the Beast Clergyman attacks ferociously, throwing rocks and themselves at their foes. Calm their aggression and return them to their senses.

name: Astel, Stars Of Darkness
description: A hostile, massive Dragon-Fly creature. Menacing and extremely powerful.
location: Yelough Anix Tunnel in Consecrated Snowfield

name: Beast Of Farum Azula
description: Underground-living creature found at Groveside Cave

name: Beastman Of Farum Azula
description: The beasts of Groveside Cave rally around the prowess of the Beastman of Farum Azula

name: Bell Bearing Hunter
description: Menacing and slow-paced, it wields a large, red-glowing sword and a shield combined with a full body armor and a chilling cape.
location: Warmaster's Shack, Northern Stormhill, Church of Vows, East Liurnia, Hermit Merchant's Shack, Leyndell Royal Captial, Dragonbarrow, North Caelid

name: Black Blade Kindred
description: Imposing Gargoyle wielding a massive armament

name: Black Knife Assassin
description: Relentless and agile dark figures carrying a
location: Deathtouched Catacombs, Black Knife Catacombs Sage's Cave

name: Bloodhound Knight Darriwil
description: The merciless bloodhounds attack with grace and agility, never backing down or giving a moment's rest.

name: Burial Tree Watchdog
description: A large feline-hound looking guardian that serves as a "Watchdog"for the Burial Tree of the Stormfoot Catacombs.

name: Cleanrot Knight
description: Powerful, dexterous Knight capable of distanced, very rapid attacks. Its spear and sword are a threat to any light-armored fighter.
location: Stillwater Cave, Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Borealis The Freezing Fog
description: Frost Dragon guarding the frozen lake of Mountaintop of Giants, emits a permanent blizzard.

name: Commander Niall
description: Commander Niall is a tall and built knight with a peg leg, clad in heavy armor, wielding a halberd that doubles as a battle standard. He is accompanied by two Spectral Banished Knights, one equipped with dual swords and the other equipped with a sword and shield.

name: Commander O'neil
description: A large and imposing human commander who wields a halberd that doubles as a battle standard, rousing his spirit minions to battle with unquenchable fervor.

name: Crucible Knight Ordovis
description: Large, heavy and fully armored. With the ability to materialize fiery wings and attack from above. Attacks with the huge power of Ordivis's Greatsword and a Greatshield. Slow, but extremely tough and highly dangerous.

name: Crystalians
description: Crystal energy in the form of a human with devastating power.

name: Deathbird
description: A bipedal bird with arms and a bird skull for a head and is found in various locations
location: Limgrave, Weeping Peninsula, Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Decaying Ekzykes
description: A pale white dragon — its scales blighted by the same scarlet rot that plagues the region of Caelid. It silently waits along the southern highway, awaiting unsuspecting travelers to fall prey to its deathly onslaught.

name: Demi-human Chief
description: The darkness of Coastal Cave hides a den of those who may look almost human, but are certainly not.

name: Demi-human Queen Maggie
description: Sovereign Demi-Human creature roaming the lands of Mt. Gelmir

name: Divine Bridge Golem
description: Enormously large and lethargic Golem that slowly storms into battle when it becomes aware of your presence.

name: Demi-human Queen Margot
description: Sovereign Demi-Human creature concealed within isolated caves.

name: Draconic Tree Sentinel
description: Massive knight clad in golden armor atop a giant horse.

name: Dragonkin Soldier
description: A large, hostile humanoid creature awaken from its drowse straight into battle.

name: Cemetery Shade
description: Amorphous and shadowy being belonging to the catacombs
location: Tombsward Catacombs, Black Knife Catacombs,Caelid Catacombs,

name: Crucible Knight
description: A formidable, dexterous fighter skilled in melee combat.
location: Stormhill Evergaol,, Stormveil Castle,, Auriza Hero's Grave

name: Dragonkin Soldier Of Nokstella
description: Huge humanoid-like creature located at the underground caves of Uhl Palace Ruins

name: Dragonlord Placidusax
description: A massive in size, two-headed dragon capable of immense acts of annihilation.

name: Elden Beast
description: It is said that long ago, the Greater Will sent a golden star bearing a beast into the Lands Between, which would later become the Elden Ring.

name: Elemer Of The Briar
description: Wielding the stolen sword from the Marais family, Elemer of the Briar stands at the top of the castle waiting.

name: Esgar, Priest Of Blood
description: A highly aggressive humanoid priest

name: Erdtree Avatar
description: A large headless create which resembles a tree stump.
location: Minor Erdtree (Weeping Peninsula), Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Southwest), Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Northeast), Minor Erdtree (Caelid), Minor Erdtree (Mountaintops East)

name: Fallingstar Beast
description: A massive quadruped with a long spiky tail and a head reminiscent of a centipede's, with massive mandibles protruding from its face. It behaves much like a bull and appears to have seismic powers, allowing it to control the earth within its chamber.
location: Sellia Crystal Tunnel, Caelid, Altus Plateau

name: Fell Twins
description: Two bulky ogre-like creatures fighting side by side with red-hot armament

name: Fia's Champions
description: Five invaders summoned in an endurance combat in three waves.

name: Flying Dragon Agheel
description: A feared-by-most massive dragon located within the Dragon-Burnt Ruins in Limgrave

name: Fire Giant
description: Upon realizing the flames of their forge would never die, Queen Marika, marked him with a curse. "O trifling giant, mayest thou tend thy, flame for eternity.

name: Flying Dragon Greyll
description: A large grey dragon, Flying Dragon Greyll patrols the bridge breathing fire and flying down on those trying to cross.

name: Frenzied Duelist
description: A humanoid with heavy armor and a massive axe.

name: God-devouring Serpent
description: A massive, menacing reptile that poses a remarkable threat.

name: Glintstone Dragon Smarag
description: A fearsome magic dragon with crystalized magic stone for scales. Jealously guards the entrance to the Academy's Crystal Cave.

name: Glintstone Dragon Adula
description: A powerful and devastating dragon, a menace for all type of fighters.

name: Godefroy The Grafted
description: A member of Godrick the Grafted's family imprisoned by the Dragon Knight during the War of the Shattering.

name: Godfrey, First Elden Lord (hoarah Loux)
description: I've given thee courtesy enough. Now I fight as Hoarah Loux. Warrior!

name: Godfrey, First Elden Lord (golden Shade)
description: Physical form of Godfrey, First Elden Lord

name: Godrick The Grafted
description: Godrick the Grafted is the ruler of Stormveil Castle, wielding a large golden axe. He has grafted many arms on his body, a symbol of power to all those who might try to depose him.
drops: Godrick's Great Rune, Remembrance of the Grafted

name: Godskin Apostle
description: The apostles, one said to serve Destined Death, are wielders of the god-slaying black flame. But after their defeat by Maliketh, the Black Blade, the source of their power was sealed away.

name: Godskin Apostle And Godskin Noble
description: They are found in their spirit forms, spawned by the opportunist Spirit-Caller Snail.
location: Spiritcaller Cave, Mountaintops of the Giants

name: Death Rite Bird
description: Immense bird skeleton with crow-like features. Rushes to battle from above while wielding a giant spear.

name: Godskin Apostle
description: The apostles, one said to serve Destined Death, are wielders of the god-slaying black flame. But after their defeat by Maliketh, the Black Blade, the source of their power was sealed away.

name: Godskin Noble
description: The most aggresive of the Godskin.

name: Grafted Scion
description: An amorphous blob that wields two swords and a shield, and appears to be grafted with multiple arms.

name: Great Wyrm Theodorix
description: A dragon wyrm with immense power.
location: North of Albinauric Rise in Mountaintops of the Giants

name: Hoarah Loux, Warrior
description: Chieftain of the Badland Warriors.

name: Kindred Of Rot
description: Large, prawn-like creatures skilled at melee combat. Its Pest's Glaive poses a menace when wielded by these agile beings.

name: Guardian Golem
description: The Guardian Golem, magical constructs that has been cut and chiseled from stone. It is the sole guardian of the Highroad Cave who holds a precious item.

name: Godskin Duo
description: A complementing pair of creatures extremely well versed in dual-battling. These beings achieve an exceptionally balance in combat, resulting in a devastating synergy.
drops: Ash of War: Black Flame Tornado

name: Kindred Of Rot
description: Large, prawn-like creatures skilled at melee combat. Its Pest's Glaive poses a menace when wielded by these agile beings.

name: Leonine Misbegotten
description: Aggressive and feral, the Misbegotten sees nothing but rage

name: Lichdragon Fortissax
description: Massive four winged black dragon with the ability to wield lightning.

name: Mad Pumpkin Head
description: A huge ogre-looking creature that has a large pumpkin helmet worn on its head. It wields a massive flail and seems to be guarding something or someone against intruders.
location: Waypoint Ruins, Limgrave, Caelem Ruins, Caelid

name: Magma Wyrm
description: A large lesser dragon with bronze-colored scales covering its body. Magma Wyrms inhabit deep cave systems and volcanos, thriving within lava-flooded environments.

name: Lion Guardian
description: The Lion Guardian of Stormveil has been coerced into service by cruel means

name: Malenia, Blade Of Miquella
description: ...Heed my words. I am Malenia. Blade of Miquella. And I have never known defeat.

name: Maliketh, The Black Blade
description: O, Death. Become my blade once more.

name: Miranda The Blighted Bloom
description: A giant poison flower that is deadlier than it looks.
location: Weeping Peninsula: Tombsward Cave, Altus Plains: Perfumer's Grotto

name: Mimic Tear
description: An eccentric being capable of taking a comprehensive shape of its adversary, ranging from body features to armament.

name: Misbegotten Crusader
description: The Lord of Frenzied Flame.
location: Cave of the Forlorn in Mountaintops of the Giants

name: Mohg, Lord Of Blood
description: Welcome, honored guest. To the birthplace of our Dynasty!

name: Mohg, The Omen
description: The Lord of Frenzied Flame

name: Magma Wyrm Makar
description: Aggressive Fire Wyrm guarding the entrance to Altus Plains from any who attempt to bypass the lift

name: Necromancer Garris
description: A humanoid necromancer draped in a red cloth. Efficient in the death sorceries.

name: Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest
description: A duo of warriors comprised of the female Swordstress, who uses a sword with a whip-like function to attack at medium range and a male Priest who uses spells from afar.

name: Night's Cavalry
description: Imposing knight figure atop a dark steed, wielding a large flail or halberd.
drops: Ash of War: Poison Moth Flight

name: Omenkiller
description: An omninous figure wielding two serrated swords.
location: Village of the Albinaurics, Volcano Manor, Perfumer's Grotto

name: Onyx Lord
description: The Onyx Lords, who had skin of stone, were called lords in reverential fear of their destructive power.

name: Perfumer Tricia
description: A long range spellcaster complemented by an armored, short-distance warrior.

name: Putrid Grave Warden Duelist
description: Grave Wardens protect the secrets of the ancients, but the corruption of the land has affected them too

name: Pumpkin Head
description: The breaking disrupted the flora and fauna of the region. Some took a rather intense liking to the larger plants that emerged

name: Putrid Tree Spirit
description: A blood-rotted tree that has found life despite the death that consumes it.

name: Radagon Of The Golden Order
description: Lord Radagon was a great champion, possessed of flowing red locks. He came to these lands at the head of a great golden host, when he met Lady Rennala in battle. He soon repented his territorial transgressions though, and became husband to the Carian Queen. However. When Godfrey, first Elden Lord, was hounded from the Lands Between, Radagon left Rennala to return to the Erdtree Capital, becoming Queen Marika's second husband and King Consort. Taking the title... of second Elden Lord.

name: Red Wolf Of Radagon
description: Fierce guardian and protector of its master, even when it has long left.
location: Raya Lucaria Academy, Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Red Wolf Of The Champion
description: A ferocious red wolf with large fangs and blistering speed.

name: Regal Ancestor Spirit
description: A spirit glowing in pale blue light, suspended in the air and taking the shape of a huge deer.

name: Royal Knight Loretta
description: The eternal guardian of Caria Manor fervently defends her domain atop the Royal Moongazing Grounds. Loretta uses her greatbow to rain destruction on all who would dare approach the estate grounds.

name: Royal Revenant
description: An obscene and disturbing abomination, blend of a spider-like creature and human limbs resulting in a quite resourceful fighter at close range.
location: Kingsrealm Ruins, Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Runebear
description: Ferocious, robust creature that's huge in size and remarkably agressive.

name: Rykard, Lord Of Blasphemy
description: Join the Serpent King, as family... Together, we will devour the very gods!

name: Scaly Misbegotten
description: A troll like scavenger with an insatiable taste for blood.

name: Sir Gideon Ofnir, The All-knowing
description: Sir Gideon Ofnir, now far from the books and immersed in battle.

name: Soldier Of Godrick
description: An esteemed high rank soldier, who wields a massive sword and wears his armor proudly.

name: Spirit-caller Snail
description: The ultimate Spiritcaller.
drops: Ash of War: Black Flame Tornado

name: Arcane Sphere Of Faces
description: Safeguard of the Witchbane Ruins' basement cellar. Mysteriously rare and highly unconventional.

name: Giant Bat
description: The Giant Bats of Limgrave are nocturnal creatures and often rest during the day, unless they are disturbed.
location: Near the cliffs on Western Limgrave.

name: Lesser Runebear
description: Feral, often massive bears with runic patterns on their chest. Most commonly found scavenging the realms of The Lands Between or fighting other wild creatures.

name: Abnormal Stone Cluster
description: Bizarre catterpillar-shaped beings formed of moss-covered spherical stones and a disturbing eye that looks like that of a human being. They are commonly found as dull groups of seemingly lifeless rocks.

name: Bladed Talon Eagle
description: The servants of Stormveil come in many shapes, including Eagles that have been enslaved and fitted with blades. Driving them to attack those who approach

name: Boar
description: The Boars of Limgrave are less aggressive than normal, but should not be assumed to be passive
location: in Forests of Limgrave and Stormhill

name: Burning Slug
description: Burning Slugs move slowly and are located in the open field.

name: Crab
description: Crabs thrive in the shallow ponds of Agheel Lake and the shores of Limgrave
location: Roaming the beaches of Western Limgrave.

name: Construct
description: An Enemy made by Enemies

name: Deer
description: Deer roam freely in the plains on Limgrave, now that hunters have all but disappeared
location: West Limgrave, South West Liurnia of The Lakes

name: Dog
description: Roaming through the fields of Limgrave, wild Dogs should not be assumed to be docile nor dull.

name: Giant Dragonfly
description: The Great Dragonflies of Limgrave buzz and harass all creatures in their vicinity

name: Direwolf
description: Found alone or in small packs, these bloodthirsty beasts stalk the Lands Between with predatory fervor.
location: Caria Manor, Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Eagle
description: Majestic Eagles can be spotted among the cliffs, even during these times.

name: Giant Crab
description: Giant Crabs crowd the shores and shallows, attacking any who approach by swinging their powerful claws and spewing forth high-pressure water.
location: in the watery areas of Agheel Lake and the beaches of Western Limgrave

name: Giant Land Octopus
description: Giant Land Octopuses are a dangerous foe for any daring to visit the beaches of Limgrave.

name: Giant Lobster
description: The Lands Between are rife with all manner of life forms, naturally evolving over long periods and adapting to the environment. One such creature is the Giant Lobster — a creature that evolved to grow to such enormous sizes in order to better defend itself against much deadlier threats.

name: Giant Poison Flower
description: Giant Poison Flowers sprout in unlikely places, and summon down the elements on those who approach them
location: within Post Town Remains in Limgrave.

name: Guillemot
description: The Guillemot on the beaches of Limgrave are docile animals, but they are easily spooked
location: Roaming the beaches of Western Limgrave.

name: Lesser Runebear
description: Feral, often massive bears with runic patterns on their chest. Most commonly found scavenging the realms of The Lands Between or fighting other wild creatures.

name: Lesser Red Wolf Of Radagon
description: Hostile, over-sized wolves majestically covered in scarlet fur.

name: Lesser Spider Hand
description: Lesser Spider Hands are horrific creatures, surpassed only by their more powerful, gigantic counterparts.
location: Caria Manor, Liurnia of the Lakes, Mountaintops of the Giants

name: Land Octopus
description: The peculiar Land Octopus is a rather small but dangerous creature
location: In the watery areas of Agheel Lake and the beaches of Western Limgrave

name: Owl
description: Owls can be resting on the cliffs of Stormhill, and would even seem friendly and unconcerned by those passing by
location: perched on cliffs around Limgrave and Stormhill

name: Poison Flower
description: Poison Flowers grow near caves and cellars in Limgrave

name: Land Squirt
description: Land Squirts are repulsive shallow water creatures that emit a poison mist to kill and devour those nearby

name: Rat
description: Giant rats plague the mines and caves of Limgrave, spreading diseases where they go
location: Limgrave Tunnels, Ailing Village, Tombsward Cave

name: Rabbitgaroo
description: A species unique to The Lands Between, as adorable as scared.
location: Limgrave, South West Liurnia of the Lakes,

name: Rotten Stray
description: Undead dogs haunt the depths of Limgrave's mines, attacking all those who dwell into the tunnels

name: Sheep
description: The sheep from Limgrave have long forgotten captivity, romaing the landscape freely instead.
location: in the pastures of Limgrave and Stormhill

name: Skeletal Slime
description: Skeletal slime drudges the shores and shallows of Limgrave, looking for prey to consume
location: in the watery areas of Agheel Lake and the beaches of Western Limgrave

name: Spirit Jellyfish
description: Spirit Jellyfish are passive creatures seeking to protect, unless angered

name: Teardrop Scarab
description: There are both Crimson and Cerulean Teardrop Scarabs. Defeat them to replenish the flasks that match their type.

name: Spider Hand
description: Spider Hands skitter about their environs, often clinging to walls to put the drop on unsuspecting trespassers. They are also capable of burrowing deep beneath the earth, violently bursting out of the ground to grab and crush their prey.
location: Caria Manor, Liurnia of the Lakes, Mountaintops of the Giants
drops: Somber Smithing Stone (2), Somber Smithing Stone (7)

name: Wild Mouflon
description: Wild Mouflons become hostile when threatened and fight their aggressors by charging forward and striking them with their large horns.

name: Turtle
description: Turtles are passive creatures almost driven to extinction by those seeking its meat, said to have curative properties

name: Wolf
description: Wolves hunt the Lands Between in packs, and all those traveling should beware of their dangerous pack leaders

name: Prawn Miner
description: Hostile over-developed creatures resembling large shrimps. Remarkably agile.
location: Sellia Crystal Tunnel, Caelid Waypoint Ruins

name: Farum Azula Dragon
description: Farum Azula Dragons fly around the Farum Azula or what's left of it, if any of them notice someone roaming around, they will come to hunt the down. They have the power of thunder and they will use it aggresively towards enemies.

name: Bloody Finger Nerijus
description: Bloody Finger Nerijus follows the Bloody Finger code, hunting for fellow Tarnished without remorse
location: Invades on the ravine leading north-east from Agheel Lake, toward Murkwater Catacombs

name: Anastasia, Tarnished-eater
description: Invaded by Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater!

name: Bloody Finger Okina
location: Flame Peak, Mountaintops of the Giants

name: Edgar The Revenger
description: Edgar the Revenger is a warrior clad in medium armor and wields a halberd. His moveset involves mostly physical attacks and his poise is easily broken with magic.
location: Revenger's Shack, Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan
description: Maleigh Marais's identity is completely shrouded by their mask and long robes. They are equipped with a rapier and move carefully around opponents. They are easily staggered with magic attacks such as Glintblade Phalanx.
location: Fields west of The Shaded Castle

name: Moongrum Carian Knight
description: Moongrum the Carian Knight is the guardian of Raya Lucaria Academy's Grand Library, he is the last line of defense against intruders who are wanting to slay the head sorcerer of the institute. Just like you, a Tarnished, Moongrum is capable of wielding two different weapons, a shield, can use sorcery, and even use Flasks to recover health. A true warrior of Raya Lucaria.

name: Recusant Henricus
description: Invaded by Recusant Henricus!

name: Albinauric
description: Due to their comically large and round heads, Albinaurics are perpetually hunched-over. They are often found in groups of five or more and they employ rudimentary combat tactics, often attacking recklessly with repeated swings and long combos that leave them open. At times, you may spot an Albinauric performing quick cartwheels on the battlefield, displaying agility despite their stature.

name: Albinauric Wolfback Archer
description: Guarding the rooftops of Ordina.

name: Banished Knight
description: A tall knight who was banished and bound to serve the Grafted Lord, and to kill those trespassers of Stormveil Castle. They are normally seen wielding a large weapon such as a longsword with a shield or a polearm, and they are fully protected with a complete set of armor.

name: Azula Beastman
description: The Beastmen of Farum Azula are ferocious half-man, half-beast warriors. They display remarkable agility and are proficient in a plethora of weaponry including various curved blades, greatswords, shields and spears. Many are also excellent marksmen with their unique curved throwing knives which they use with deadly precision.

name: Baleful Shadow
description: Assassins of the Two Fingers sent forth to carry out their dirty work

name: Blackflame Monk
description: Mysterious hooded figures belonging to an order of monks that call upon the power of the Black Flame, as well as their astute martial prowess to fell foes and trespassers of their domains.

name: Black Knight
description: The Black Knight, riding atop a dark steed, wielding a mighty halberd.
location: Limgrave, south-east of the telescope, patrolling on a bridge

name: Godrick Knight
description: Wielders of heavy swords and spears, protected by large shields and fully armored. These Knights are often aided in combat by soldiers or hostile dogs, therefore posing a threat to the unprepared and novice.

name: Castle Guard
description: Castle Guards comprise the bulk of Stormveil's defenses, but are by no means the most dangerous of the many great ones within.

name: Chanting Winged Dame
description: The Chanting Winged Dames of Liurnia of The Lakes are equally hostile as they are suspicious.
location: Ruin-Strewn Precipice, Liurnia of The Lakes, Fort Faroth

name: Commoner
description: The Commoner is a servant that is bound to perform duties for their superiors within Stormveil Castle. They appear to be tall, slender, yet weak, who is still capable of fighting trespassers.

name: Demi-human
description: Agile and hostile, Demi-Humans scavenge the land in groups commanded by a leader, a stronger and more menacing creature. They roam the field light-armored and wielding a wide range of melee weapons and wooden shields.
location: Caves and beaches of Limgrave, such as Dissenter's Cave.

name: Fire Monk
description: Fire Monks hierarchically gather in ceremonies, often at night, burning their way through Liurnia of The Lakes with torches and Mobile Flamethrowers. Fire Monk Abbots have the powerful ability of bursting flames from their hands and must be fought carefully.

name: Sorcerer Miner
description: Frail and malnourished, Diggers wield a glintstone-imbued staff for mining which doubles as a weapon when push comes to shove.

name: Flame Guardian
description: Flame Guardians are slender humanoids dressed in simple white garbs and wearing a bronze mask, concealing their identity. They are equipped with long, flaming poles/staves and wield fire magic.

name: Glintstone Sorcerer
description: Glintstone Sorcerers are decked in Raya Lucarian Robes and distinct Glintstone Crown masks that obscure their identity. These scholars have access to lower level spells such as Glintstone Pebble, among others.

name: Gnoll
description: Hungry Gnolls are usually found eating from dead bodies which makes them vulnerable to surprise or stealth attacks, but they are quick and unforgivingly lethal. They come in different classes, some of the wield a sword and use it very acrobatically, other use shields and some even are able to cast thunder.

name: Godrick Soldier
description: The Godrick Soldiers of the Lands Between now roam the landscape, their clothes rags, hoping to rebuild their lives
location: Gatefront Ruins, Castle Morne, Stormgate, Roaming the Limgrave landscape

name: Golem
description: Golems lay inactive in the hills of Stormhill, but those foolish enough to wake them will soon curse their fate
location: West ruins of Stormhill., Castle Morne Entrance, Ainsel River Well, Leyndell, Royal Capital

name: Highwayman
description: Former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry. Clandestine and secluded from civilazation, now they lie in hidden caves.

name: Great Horned Tragoth
description: Invading another world. Defeat Great Horned Tragoth!

name: Gold Dragon Cult Knight
description: Exceedingly tough and skillful Knight, a golden armor-wearing menace lethal to most. Highly trained warrior and a threatening adversary due to its fine combat skills.

name: Imp
description: Imps infest many catacombs in the Lands Between, although some theorize they could be protecting their secrets

name: Imp Miner
description: Small and agile creatures that typically conceal themselves within a smokescreen., Often wielding an axe or a flail amd performing flying attacks.

name: Invisible Warrior
description: Sneak warriors, patient and quick to get in your back.

name: Imp
description: Imps infest many catacombs in the Lands Between, although some theorize they could be protecting their secrets

name: Lesser Burial Watchdog
description: A living construct fashioned after felines and hounds, made to watch over catacombs. These constructs wield massive stone weaponry and are attuned to different elements.

name: Knight Of Zamor
description: Knights of Zamor are slender humanoids with long hair, wielding a peculiar curved blade. These warriors are graceful and perform almost dance-like maneuvers as they weave across the battlefield. As denizens of the Mountaintops of the Giants, Knights of Zamor are strongly attuned to Frost, utilizing its powers to bolster their swordplay.

name: Lesser Pumpkin Head
description: The Lesser Pumpkin Head is a weaker variant of the Pumpkin Head. It appears to be an outcast due to its appearance and is mainly used as one of a weapon to fight against intruders and trespassers alike. The Lesser Pumpkin Head can be seen wearing a Pumpkin Helm, a distressed cloak, and wields a large club.
location: Castle Morne, Raya Lucaria Academy, Limgrave

name: Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit
description: A guardian that sleeps deep within the crypt of Stormveil Castle. It is quick and very aggressive when it attacks and moves similar to a centipede with its multiple legs. The Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit also features two large arms and a tail that it mainly uses to swing around or to slam the ground.

name: Living Jar
description: The Living Jar, a walking vase that has long arms used for reaching and attacking their foes. A Living Jar may appear small in a group and it can also appear as a singular giant entity, capable of using slow, yet strong attacks.

name: Lesser Wormface
description: Lesser Wormface may not be as large as Wormface itself but they can be found roaming around in groups around Crumbling Farum Azula.

name: Maneuverable Flamethrower
description: Large wagons operated from the inside that shoot fire from a sculpture's mouth.

name: Marionette Gargoyle
description: The Marionette Gargoyle are statues within Raya Lucaria Academy that have been reanimated with magical properties. They mainly fly in the air and wield a scythe that they use to attack their foes. They are usually found on posts, pretending to be statues.

name: Marionette Soldier
description: Marionette Soldiers are puppets that are created and given life by superior being that reside within Raya Lucaria Academy. Their purpose is to protect and stop intruders from entering the institute. These soldiers appear to have multiple arms wielding more than one weapon, making them unpredictable in regards to how they will strike.
location: Raya Lucaria Academy, Academy Gate Town, Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel, Witchbane Ruins

name: Miner
description: The ever working miners of Limgrave know no life but their toil, and will fiercely defend it
location: Limgrave Tunnels, Sellia Crystal Tunnel, Ruin-Strewn Precipice

name: Mounted Northern Mercenary
description: Mounted Northern Mercenaries are often seen guarding important deliveries and outposts, such as Stormgate

name: Mounted Knight
location: North-east region of Limgrave, North of Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Noble Sorcerer
description: Noble Sorcerers are frail old men wearing tattered garbs and a dirty yellow cape. They use a standard glintstone staff as both a sorcery catalyst and walking stick.

name: Misbegotten
description: The Misbegotten are small humanoid creatures with small wings on their backs and a tail that reaches to the ground. Treated as slaves or worse from the time they are born, they rush in attack wildly and ruthlessly with their Iron Cleavers.
location: Castle Morne, Weeping Peninsula, Mt. Gelmir

name: Kaiden Sellsword
description: Kaiden Sellswords roam the land, looking to be hired for several protection roles

name: Omen
description: A large ogre that is kept imprisoned within the grounds of Stormveil Castle. It appears to be battered and treated violently to discipline it, and used as a weapon to fight against trespassers.

name: Pendulum Statue
description: A golden statue that sits on a small wagon. Attached to it are two pendulum blades that can extend to capture its prey. The Pendulum Statue is being controlled by an unkown creature that rests within it, only by opening its chest will it reveal its root-like tentacles.

name: Old Knight Istvan
description: Invading another world. Defeat Old Knight Istvan!

name: Pumpkin Head
description: The breaking disrupted the flora and fauna of the region. Some took a rather intense liking to the larger plants that emerged

name: Smithing Master Hewg
quote: I'm a prisoner, and these are my chains. I'm trapped by the Hold, undying, smithing for you fools. That's all there is to it.

name: Roderika
quote: Everyone who came with me. They crossed the sea for me. They fought, for me. Heh... Only to have their arms taken. Their legs taken. Even their heads...taken. Taken and stuck to the spider.

name: Thops
quote: For a small donation, I'd be happy to share my knowledge.
location: Church of Irith in Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Enia
quote: The Fingers guide us all. And you Tarnished, you are here to take, are you not?

name: Miriel, Pastor Of Vows
quote: I Welcome you, to the Church of Vows. I am Miriel, steward of this sacred chamber. My apologies, for the unseemly state of affairs. Do you know the origin of this place?
role: Steward of the Church of Vows

name: War Counselor Iji
quote: Well, look at you. We don't receive many visitors
location: Kingsrealm Ruins, Western Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Sorcerer Rogier
quote: The pleasure's mine. Rogier's the name. A sorcerer, as you might have guessed.

name: Gurranq, Beast Clergyman
quote: I feel it's stench on you... death. Feed it to me.

name: Boc The Seamster
quote: Hm? Oh, yes I remember. Some clod turned me into a tree.

name: Brother Corhyn
quote: I teach incantations, the strength granted us by the Two Fingers, and explore the secrets of the Golden Order. So that one day, if a Tarnished of the Roundtable Hold should become Elden Lord, I might counsel them, ensuring order regains its proper form, righting rule over men.

name: D, Hunter Of The Dead
quote: Insert NPC quote here.

name: Knight Bernahl
quote: Let me ask you something Are you here in the Lands Between to take up the fight? Does your faith in the guidance of grace hold firm, despite the collapse of the Golden Order?

name: Pidia, Carian Servant
quote: But please, can you offer poor ill-starred Pidia...

name: Melina
quote: Have you heard of the finger maidens? They serve the Two Fingers, offering guidance, and aid, to the Tarnished. But you, I am afraid, are maidenless. I can play the role of maiden.
location: The beginning of the Tarnished's journey.

name: Bloody Finger Hunter Yura
quote: Be on your way. Perhaps we will meet again, if fate permits

name: Iron Fist Alexander
quote: I am Alexander, also known as the Iron Fist. And as you can see, I'm stuck here.

name: White-faced Varré
quote: Are you familiar with grace? The golden light that gives life to you Tarnished You may also behold its golden rays pointing in a particular direction at times That is the guidance of grace. The path that a Tarnished must travel.

name: Renna
quote: Unless thou should take the crown?"

name: Fia
quote: Great champion, would you allow me to hold you, but briefly?

name: Edgar
quote: Even if the castle should fall, as commander, I must remain.

name: Irina
quote: My good father secreted me out the castle, but decided himself to stay. He says it's his duty, as commander. I... I fear for father's life.

name: Kenneth Haight
quote: Hello? Is anybody there? Someone who might be interested on rescuing the great Kenneth Haight? Servant of the true Order, and celebrated repudiator of the false!, O Erdtree! Grant me succour!

name: Queen Marika
quote: Now, Queen Marika the Eternal is nowhere to be found, and in the Night of the Black Knives Godwyn the Golden was first to perish. Soon, Marika's offspring, demigods all, claimed the shards of the Elden Ring. The mad taint of their newfound strength triggered the Shattering.

name: Knight Diallos
quote: The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood. I, Diallos, swear to deliver that promise.

name: Frustrated Spirit
quote: All I wanted was to fight. To fight, as a warrior, to the last... So, Why? Why, O guidance of grace, will this door not open?

name: Frustrated Spirit
quote: All I wanted was to fight. To fight, as a warrior, to the last... So, Why? Why, O guidance of grace, will this door not open?

name: Gideon Ofnir
quote: As a Tarnished who wishes to stand before the Elden Ring and become Elden Lord, I am accumulating knowledge. To be all-knowing.

name: Patches
quote: I'm Patches. Patches the Untethered.
role: x2 Golden Rune (1), Grovel for Mercy

name: Hyetta
quote: Hello? Is someone there? My name is Hyetta, and I'm journeying in search of the distant light. If I might be so bold as to ask... would you donate any Shabriri grapes in your possession to me? My eyesight has been weak since birth, you see. I can't tell which way I'm supposed to go next.

name: Palm Reader
quote: You, please, I can read them. Your fingers, please, your fingers...

name: Nepheli Loux
quote: Be proud. You were a fine warrior. Your only mistake was your choice of master.

name: Rya
quote: A pleasure to meet you, Brave Tarnished.

name: Tanith
quote: I am Tanith, the proprietress of this house. An honour to have you.

name: Ranni The Witch
quote: I am the witch Ranni. I stole Death long ago, and search now for the dark path.

name: Primeval Sorcerer Azur
quote: A mysterious and silent figure residing near the Hermit Village.

name: Dung Eater
quote: I told you not to disturb me

name: Preceptor Seluvis
quote: I don't know what it is the mistress sees in a provincial Tarnished like you, but since we have the misfortune of serving the same Lady, I ask that you kindly try not to drag us all down with you.

name: Blaidd
quote: The name's Blaidd. I'm looking for a man who goes by "Darriwil."

name: Gowry
quote: The rotting sickness that afflicts Millicent has no cure. When the Erdtree flourished, even the demigods could not stave off its effects, despite their nigh godhood.

name: Millicent
quote: I would rather trust you than simply continue to spoil from within.

name: Bloodhunter Raz
quote: ...I've still my pride. I'm not going out like a complete monster.

name: Latenna
quote: Foul tarnished, what do you want?
location: Liurnia of the Lakes, Slumbering Wolf's Shack

name: Albus
quote: Please, no. Dear me!. I haven't a clue. No secrets lie with me, not a one.
location: Village of the Albinaurics, Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Shabriri
quote: May chaos take the world! May chaos take the world!

name: Witch-hunter Jerren
quote: Brave champion, you have our gratitude

name: Blackguard Big Boggart
quote: Never met someone with a taste for prawns I couldn't trust.
